name: Entire renTal unit hosted by Tal
summary: In the heart of Tel Aviv in a quiet street just few steps from the beach, this beautiful apartment has been totally renovated and carefully decorated by an architect. You will enjoy a terrace of 35 m2, a fully equipped kitchen open to a large living room, as well as 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. An apartment where life is good and perfect to enjoy Tel Aviv!.
houseRules: Please no shoes when you are in the apartment. the floors scuff easily and after all it is NYC.  Also, please take trash out when you leave and place towels on hooks to the left of the closet.

host.location: Tel Aviv, Tel Aviv Jaffa, Israel

address.street: Tel Aviv, Tel Aviv District, Israel

reviews.txt:
top looking. Book this now. You won’t be disappointed. Beautiful apartment. Sparkling clean. Love the neighborhood. So much to see and do. I would definitely stay here again. 
 We are a family of 6 with teenage girls. The space was more than comfortable. The host was communicative throughout the booking process. We had no reason to contact them throughout our stay as the apartment was well equipped and all our needs were more than satisfied. Highly recommend!
incredible location and spacey home. Had an issue with the door and he was super quick to respond and got a locksmith immediately! Stay here!!!!
Very clean, open, airy and spacious. Luxurious accommodations within walking distance to great markets, shops, coffee, and the beach! Relaxing on the rooftop balcony was a delight.
Tal was very welcoming, accesible and flexible. She made our stay a pleasant experience.

Tal's place was clean and beautifully decorated. We had the apartment to ourselves for the three days we were in Tel Aviv, and the whole experience was perfect. It's located within a quick walking distance of a 24-hour CVS, plenty of restaurants, a Metro Station, local markets and parks, and we always felt safe walking around together, even late at night. She's a very pleasant host and was quick to communicate with us whenever we had questions during our stay. I would absolutely book here again! Thank you, Tal!
Great location. Everything was lovely and as described. Tal was a super accommodating and friendly host.
This apartment has exceeded all my expectations. The view of the beach from the porch, the comfiest beds, cleanliness, and location, All were a 10/10..
Really beautiful flat in a great location. Well stocked, comfortable and lots of light. An all round great place to stay!.

We were very happy in this beautiful apartment. The giant terrace was fabulous just to sit out in the sun and also to have a relaxing dinner outside; the furniture was all comfortable and the decor is as nice as the photos make it look. Plenty of storage and lots and lots of towels! The kitchen is totally equipped and enabled us to make dinner for 10, and we were also able to do laundry during our stay..

Tal's space was a lovely spot to visit in NY and was much better than expected. There were many places nearby to eat, shop and explore. Access to the subway was perfect. Could not have asked for better accommodations. Would definitely stay here again!

This apartment is perfect for a family to stay when visiting Tel Aviv. It is a very comfortable and clean apartment, walking distance to the beach, restaurants, shops and more. We absolutely loved our visit to Tel Aviv, and would stay at Michel's place again. Tal is a very responsive SuperHost!
Our host Tal is outstanding and great with communication. The unit is in a great location, although very noisy due to the proximity to the busy street and beach. Overall a nice unit.

Amazing apartment with nice finishing touches. The apartment is spacious and we loved the open concept of the kitchen and living room area. Close to the beach, restaurants, and shops. Michel was a great host. We would love to stay in this apartment again on our next trip to Tel Aviv.

Perfect location!! Lots of nice Japanese restaurants and bubble tea downstairs. Real room decorating is better than photos. Cozy and romantic little apartment. Tal is nice. Good place to live in east village(๑˙ｰ˙๑)
